response.overview: Of all the Nutcrackers there ever were, this one is definitely the nuttiest! "The Nutcracker," a story about a young girl named Clara, who, after receiving a charming nutcracker for Christmas, finds herself smack dab in the midst of a battle against an evil Mouse King for control of the Magical World of Dreams. It's filled with fun and fanciful entertainment for the whole family. "The Nutcracker" -- put one under your Christmas tree!
response.title: The Nutcracker
